short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize It All is a Chrome extension that summarizes articles, posts, and emails for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize It All is a versatile browser extension designed to save you time by providing quick summaries of content from various platforms. Whether you're browsing LinkedIn, X (formerly Twitter), Medium, or reading lengthy messages on WhatsApp or Gmail, this extension simplifies information consumption by generating concise summaries with just a click.

Key Features:
- Platform Integration: Summarize posts directly on LinkedIn, X, Medium, WhatsApp, and Gmail with a single click.
- Universal Summarization: Select any text on the web, right-click, and choose "Summarize" to instantly condense the content.
- Time-Saving: Quickly grasp the essence of lengthy posts, messages, and articles without reading through everything in detail.

Using the Extension:
- On Supported Platforms:
You'll see a "Summarize" button on posts or messages. Click it to get a summary instantly.

- On Other Sites:
Highlight any text, right-click, and select "Summarize" from the context menu to condense the selected content.
